replies.body: personally i think they should make a system where they have a points system where every time your reported it decreases and everytime you get honoured it increases and depnding on the amount of points you have, if you have a negative amount and several players in your game report you then your banned for, -10 points, a day, -20 points, 2 days e.t.c. and if you win a game in norms itll give you 1 extra ip for every point you have. to stop this from being abused too much they should ban players from honoring their friends more than once per ten games with that friend. but as i write this comment i realize the massive amount of i honor you you honor me harassment of this mechanic but wouldn't it be great if they utilized this kind of system? i mean it would give great meaning behind honoring a player that really held on and kept with the team...

That's not a good idea. Losing rank due to reports and gaining extra rank due to honours isn't a balanced and unbiased way to play.

The ranking system is there to demonstrate _rank_, not how favourable of a player you are; if someone falsely reports you on the enemy team after they lose, you'd lose points for not doing anything wrong. Alternatively, the honouring system becomes a bartering tool of sorts - the phrase "mid or no honour" would become commonplace. Allies may also report you for an accidental kill steal or something of the like. Heck, I've had people report me for spamming after a well-deserved "wp" or "gj".

This system, while different, is incredibly poorly thought out. Under this system, ranks would be determined by how friendly and favourable you are, and ignores skill and game-winning plays in favour of personal bias; two players of equal skill could be in two different ranks due to one being a funnier person, or the other person is deemed not funny enough.

**Putting your rank into the hands of an unaligned third party is not the way to run a skill ranking system**

By introducing Promo Helper they are basically admitting that the current system has big problems.  Promo Helper does not fix those problems in any sensible way.

Better option 1: Get rid of promo games completely e.g. You move above 2200 MMR and immediately move up to the next level.  Fall below 2200 and you immediately get dropped.

Better option 2: Promote players with the points they deserve, instead of starting players on zero points after promotion. e.g. You win your first two promo games and get promoted with the points from your two wins - you might be on lets say 36 points.  Or, you win two and lose one and you get promoted, starting on say 18 points (for example)
